ing: 1 fluid ounce hazelnut liqueur, such as Frangelico
des: "Cinnamon sticks and a cherry are used as the antlers and reindeer nose on the edge of the glass for garnish!"
ins: Pour the vodka, hazelnut liqueur, rum, and half-and-half into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled martini glass; garnish with the cinnamon sticks to look like antlers, and the cherry on the rim to look like a nose.
